backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling user profiles, access control, Stripe checkout/session status, booking types, and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files and components with associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of major frontend React components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme color variables and applying base background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx with metadata and root container.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application wrapper rendering landing page sections within access control, error diagnostics, and dark-theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AccessCodeGate.t: Access-gate component requiring a fixed code to reveal the app, storing unlock state in sessionStorage with manual reset.
frontend/src/components/AccessRestricted: Placeholder component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard that checks admin status and displays bookings with tabs for bookings and availability.
frontend/src/components/BuildFailureDiag: Displays captured build errors in a modal with copying and dismissal tools for debugging.
frontend/src/components/EthicsAndBoundar: Static section outlining ethical guidelines, boundaries, and disclaimers for the service.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with branding, quote, and attribution including a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background imagery, gold accents, and messaging introducing The Clearing.
frontend/src/components/InviteGate.tsx: Gate component that unlocks access when a valid invite secret is found in the URL or session storage.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Shows a payment-cancelled message with instructions and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Displays a payment confirmation with optional booking details and a return-home button.
frontend/src/components/PractitionerAuth: Section presenting the practitioner’s bio, experience, headshot, and social links.
frontend/src/components/PriceAndValue.ts: Displays the session price, duration, and value framing within a styled SectionShell layout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/ReadyToBookCTA.t: Renders a call‑to‑action section with a button that redirects users to an external booking link.
frontend/src/components/SectionShell.tsx: Reusable layout wrapper providing spacing, visuals, optional accent labels, and background variants.
frontend/src/components/SessionStructure: Outlines the four‑step structure of a session using numbered sections within a styled layout.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/WhatItIs.tsx: Explains what The Clearing is, what it is not, and clarifies its principles using structured text and lists.
frontend/src/components/WhatToExpect.tsx: Describes expected benefits and outcomes of The Clearing with a detailed list of practical value points.
frontend/src/components/WhoThisIsFor.tsx: Lists criteria for who the session is suitable for and who it is not, using two structured columns.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login state, stored identities, and exposing login/clear methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks that call backend actor methods for user profiles, Stripe config, checkout sessions, and bookings with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines base Tailwind styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, typography rules, and a gold shimmer animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/captureAppErrors.ts: Implements a global error capture utility that records runtime and promise errors, stores them, and notifies subscribers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radii, shadows, plugins, and theme extensions tied to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Captures the current architecture and status of the DApp, including frontend/backend design, authentication, scheduling, payments, and admin tools. Also documents architectural notes and known issues with time handling, booking flow, payment verification, and state persistence.
